Package com.example.sphinxevents

Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.example.sphinxevents.Event
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Event extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an Event that entrants can join, or organizers can create Stores Event data and provides methods for retrieving and setting this data
See Also:
